channel.title: Need Compiler Help! Please someone help quick!

item.title: Need Compiler Help! Please someone help quick!
item.dc:creator: @Westl55 Westl55
item.description:
@Westl55 wrote:

Ok so i have a good source and client that i want to make into a server. But the compiler doesn’t work and its different than ones that ive seen before. When i open it it says You dont havent downloaded java i need to fix it so it compiles. this is what the code is when you hit edit:

@echo off
@TITLE Edge4Pk Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Can someone please tell me how to edit this when i have java jdk 1.7.0_02? And i have the 64 bit or x86 version. Please help!

Read full topic
item.source: Need Compiler Help! Please someone help quick!
